name: Cozy Cthulu
description:
Cozy Cthulu Presents: A Well Crafted Brew is a go-at-your-own-pace crafting game. 

There are no time limits, no tools, and no shortage of resources. Your day consists of taking a nice rainy day stroll through your fields to collect herbs, spices, and rocks.

Your Cozy Master has gifted you a Magic Teacup! How thoughtful! Use this to craft a variety of creatures and pets to fill your greenhouse with homebrewed friends!

Controls
The CthuluControllerApp must be used alongside the game to play. This is your controller.

  • Your teacup controls all. Use it like a joystick to walk around, and tap it to interact with things when prompted. 
  • Tapping one of the four bowls on screen will add 1 unit of their held ingredient to the teacup.
  • Tapping the teacup while it has ingredients (is glowing), will attempt to create your brew! You'll here a sound if it failed.
  • Holding your finger on a bowl for a few seconds will dump it without adding to the teacup.
  • Certain sources will add ingredients automatically. For example, if your phone shows a fireplace on screen, your tea is being heated!
